content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, though our given roles here do not reflect my real identity, let us focus on the negotiation at hand. Regarding the rental price for this highly sought-after apartment in Magdeburg city center, I have high expectations due to its prime location and modern features. I'll start with a proposal of 1250 Euros per month. What figure do you have in mind, Haoyu Wang? 

Remember to only negotiate the rental price in this exercise and follow the given rules. If you want to accept the rental price proposed by the other party respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not, continue negotiating or state a reason to end the discussion ('I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'). If an agreement is reached or no agreement can be found after negotiations, the scenario will be considered terminated ('TERMINATE').
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
